data.title: 2016 Trofeo Estate Amphora Single
data.description: Fermented and matured in Florentine Terracotta Amphora, this single block Pinot Gris has been created from just two 500L Amphorae. Aromas of green pears and ripe white peach are matched on the palate and mingle with red apples and subtle toffee notes. This wine has lovely depth of flavour that is long lasting, well balanced and refreshing.
data.method: ermented and matured in Florentine Terracotta Amphora, this single block Pinot Gris has been created from just two 500L Amphorae.
